com.daw.pms.Service.QQMusic

Interface QQMusicSongService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QQMusicSongServiceImpl

    public interface QQMusicSongService
    Service for handle songs of qq music.
    Since:
    6/1/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Get detail song with mid songMid.

    • Method Detail

      • getSongsIdFromPlaylist

        List<String> getSongsIdFromPlaylist(int dirId,
                                    String cookie)
        Get songs id from playlist dirId.
        Parameters:
        dirId - Playlist's dirId.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A list of songId for your playlist with dirId.
        API Note:
        GET /playlist/map?dirid=dirId

      • getDetailSong

        Result getDetailSong(String songMid,
                     String cookie)
        Get detail song with mid songMid.
        Parameters:
        songMid - The mid of this song.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        Detail song with songMid, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is QQMusicDetailSong.
        API Note:
        GET /song?songmid=songMid

      • getSimilarSongs

        List<QQMusicSong> getSimilarSongs(String songId,
                                  String cookie)
        Get the similar songs according to songId.
        Parameters:
        songId - The id of song.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A list of songs that is similar to song songId.
        API Note:
        GET /song/similar?id=songId

      • getLyrics

        QQMusicLyrics getLyrics(String songMid,
                        String cookie)
        Get the lyrics of the song with songMid.
        Parameters:
        songMid - The mid of song.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        Lyrics of your song in QQMusicLyrics.
        API Note:
        GET /lyric?songmid=songMid

      • getSongCoverUri

        String getSongCoverUri(String albumMid,
                       String cookie)
        Get the cover uri of the song/album with albumMid.
        Parameters:
        albumMid - The albumMid of song.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        Cover uri of your song.
        API Note:
        GET /album?albummid=albumMid

      • getSongLink

        String getSongLink(String songMid,
                   String type,
                   String mediaMid,
                   String cookie)
        Get the url of song with songMid songMid and mediaMid mediaMid and type type.
        Parameters:
        songMid - The song mid.
        type - The quality(128, 320, flac, m4a, ogg) of song you want to get.
        mediaMid - The mediaMid of song.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        The url of your song with mid songMid and mediaMid mediaMid and type type
        API Note:
        GET /song/url?id=songMid&type=type&mediaId=mediaMid

      • getSongsLink

        Result getSongsLink(String songMids,
                    String cookie)
        Get the url of songs with songMids songMids.
        Parameters:
        songMids - The songMid, separated with comma.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        The urls of your songs with mid songMids, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is Map<String, String>.
        API Note:
        GET /song/urls?id=songMids

      • searchSongsByKeyword

        Result searchSongsByKeyword(String name,
                            int pageNo,
                            int pageSize,
                            String cookie)
        Search and return paged songs according to the given keyword name.
        Parameters:
        name - The search keyword.
        pageNo - Page order.
        pageSize - Size one page.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        Searched result wrapped in Result DTO, the data is PagedDataDTO<QQMusicSong>.
        API Note:
        GET /search?key=name&pageNo=pageNo&pageSize=pageSize
